author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This in response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49892.
Update streamer files to include the change in data-format from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49734. 
Companion of `cms-data` PR https://github.com/cms-data/DQM-Integration/pull/17

#### PR validation:

```
scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-pfgpu_dqm_sourceclient
scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-pixelgpu_dqm_sourceclient 
scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-ecalgpu_dqm_sourceclient
scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-hcalgpu_dqm_sourceclient
```

all run fine when tested in conjunction with https://github.com/cms-data/DQM-Integration/pull/17.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: update run number used for `streamDQMGPUvsCPU` based client tests
